nodes.text: Calabosh-2 was an astronomical object located in the Calabosh system, a part of the Expansion Region's Arc d'Stot sector. During the Galactic Civil War, it was the site of the main headquarters of the weapons manufacturer Caliban. The Human Corman Jeihn, who hailed from Calabosh-2, was employed with Caliban as a security guard at the time.

Since Caliban's marketing plan was sympathetic to the Rebel Alliance, the armed forces of the Galactic Empire soon arrived at the company's headquarters at Calabosh-2. After Caliban was nationalized by Imperial Munitions at some point by 3 ABY, Jeihn moved to the Outer Rim Territories planet Bespin, where he eventually became a member of the Bespin Wing Guard security force.

Calabosh-2 was first mentioned in the 2002 Wizards of the Coast sourcebook Arms & Equipment Guide, which was authored by Jeff Grubb and Owen K.C. Stephens for use with the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Calabosh system, and therefore Calabosh-2, in grid square K-15.
